document_data.name: Jailgates
document_data.services: Legal courts, prison cells, barracks for town guards
document_data.Location: It was located in the northern portion of the city, one block north of [[Elversult Hall]], acting as a sort of border between the residences of wealthy Elversians and the surrounding cityscape.
document_data.Structure: The Jailgates was nothing short of a fortress, with dense foundations and well-protected underground chambers.
document_data.History: The infirmary of the Jailgates served as the resting place for the body of Lady Lord [[Yanseldara]] for a while in the {{YearlinkName|1364}}, when she was put in a catatonic state for some time by the [[dracolich]] [[Hethcypressarvil]].
